definition: term of office/while holding a post
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: This has added to the already awesome power of incumbency .
sentences.chinese: 這更增加了任職期間本已令人敬畏的權勢。

sentences.english: This was the first aim of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 這是他任職期間的第一目標。

sentences.english: Walking was what several senior HP managers did during Ms Fiorina's reign.
sentences.chinese: 幾名惠普的高級經理就在費奧瑞納任職期間一走了之。

definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
